original_text: Jesus and his disciples arrived again in Jerusalem. Jesus was walking about in the yard at the temple. The leaders of the priests, the teachers of God's Law and the important Jews came to him.
korean_text: 그들이 다시 예루살렘에 들어가니라 예수께서 성전에서 거니실 때에 대제사장들과 서기관들과 장로들이 나아와

sentences.original_text: Jesus and his disciples arrived again in Jerusalem.
Jesus was walking about in the yard at the temple.
The leaders of the priests came to him.
The teachers of God's Law came to him.
The important Jews came to him.
